html:
11.15.18  5:09 pm   Have you ever had a time when you had nothing to do?

     no

11.15.18  5:09 pm   what is the first question you have received, alphabetically?

     "a", or "0" depending on how you prefer to do the alphabetic system. or actually surely something with just a punctuation mark, i think in some systems that would be considered sooner alphabetically

11.15.18  5:00 pm   Do you know how awesome and inspirational your long long journey song is?

     the chorus originally seemed like i was onto something, but in the race of production i think i blacked out

11.15.18  4:57 pm   Hey sorry about my message a couple hours ago saying you're in a major key rut you and should start on the one chord less and whatever, I don't really even believe that and I'm just in a very frustrated depressed bullshitty kinda phase of my life right now and I've been not writing to you much because I just don't want to spew any of that negativity at you of all people, you truly inspire me but i'm also quite jealous of you in some ways and intimidated by your skills, i guess i try to bring you down a peg in my mind sometimes so I feel better about my own abilities and achievements (or lack thereof), sorry about that, I'm trying to do better, oh and also I realized slow down's  verse starts with like an Fsus or something not a regular major anyways I think, I don't even fucking know I'm kinda stupid and anyways I'm gonna take a break from writing in till I have something more worthwhile to ask/contribute, hope you have a good day! 

     slow down is kind of a blues so the melody will borrow those Ab's from F min but it probably usually won't so much hit F min directly. it's gonna borrow from Fmin when it's on that Bb7 chord. really you might say that blues tunes like this are said to be in the key of F7, but ironically this one actually probably never literally uses the A and Eb notes at the same time (that's the core twang ingredient in the actual F7 chord) ...... for some reason in my world, i find even if you want to express the sentiment of F7 over time, for some reason I almost never actually use the A and Eb notes at the same time. but there sure is a hell of a lot of interchange which allows me to bend the road around hitting those notes in close proximity to each other, over time. including borrowing even more on either side, such as those Ab's, or even Db's, or the other way i think there is a sort of Fmaj7 (E note) here and there, probably somewhere in the mids of the fax machine etc. Also i have a song under high consideration lately which is firmly affixed in minor not in a sad way, and you did get me thinking. so what you are saying is legit. uptown funk, stayin alive, havana, trillions and trillions of other songs are firmly based in a minor key and yet are not sad at all. they are "bad" (another example)

11.15.18  4:56 pm   have you ever wanted to build something very big?

     yes

11.15.18  4:36 pm   So by your logic the mind is the best instrument 

     a person singing and playing songs on acoustic guitar in front of a live audience can pretty well get the job done if you can fly all that ship correctly

11.15.18  4:08 pm   How do you cope with an argument with your parents?

     make a website dedicated to myself

11.15.18  3:36 pm   how many people do you personally thinks it takes to tango?

     1

11.15.18  3:05 pm   why am I sad

     to prepare you to be happy in the near future

11.15.18  2:51 pm   what gives you the right

     fox i suppose

11.15.18  2:42 pm   why is bass guitar the best instrument out of them all?

     i think the 'best' instrument would be something that is ideal for taking care of the the chords and the bass at the same time, as well as the melody and words if possible. and pictures and images, ideally

11.15.18  2:23 pm   What is the reality/improve pages for

     the reality page is so you can get a bit more of an inside look of the actual situations of my life. the improv page is so you can hopefully hear some of the improvisation i have done

11.15.18  2:21 pm   can I be an idiot?

     sure, if you are smart enough

11.15.18  1:54 pm   I'm beginning to think I might be afraid of the sun, and that scares me. What should I do?

     just sit back and relax, i will see if i can have it destroyed for you

11.15.18  1:50 pm   what do you do when you feel sad to get better?

     explain everything. or at least just explain something, until it leads to an explanation that helps things

11.15.18  1:26 pm   what's the dumbest question you've ever gotten?

     there are no dumb questions nor smart questions. only stupid questions

11.15.18  1:22 pm   I think you should include the time a question is asked, and the time you answer it, just like on the anagram page. That might clear up some confusion. 

     2 dates for every question???? less confusing????

11.15.18  1:17 pm   Have you thought about releasing an album/EP and releasing some songs off it as singles?

     yes but i'm not sure if i see exactly why that would be better than treating every song with the respect of a single

11.15.18  1:16 pm   I am at music school, I am a drummer and want to compose music, i have some moderate to intense internal struggles. you are very inspiring to me

     there are some crazy twists and turns you probably will and should go through. if you do a good job sort of documenting where things are at each day that will help you maintain clear focus. and when all is said and done i think your drumming foundation will give you some outrageous advantages especially when it comes to the world of time. even if you become an actor, or sports announcer, anything, you'll still see those time-related advantages. and don't forget to leave school and get lost in the jungle

11.15.18  12:49 pm   You seem to be in a bit of a major key overload,

     minor songs always seem like a good idea in thought but then when it comes time for the magic, they have a habit of swapping themself out. for example, 'outside' verse (just picked up the newspaper) originally came to me with the first chord as it's relative minor. same melody but the first chord as it's rel. minor. that was how it went (so then it would have been C#-7, F#-7, B7sus4) but then as i familiarized myself with the figure and started writing more lines, they automatically felt better starting from the rel 1 (E). speaking of outside, the chorus starts on 5 (and also the intro). it seems like a nice idea, in theory, to be sad sometimes, but in reality there is never a great time to do it

      also a starting-sections-with-the-one chord overload.

     long journey chorus starts on 4. every bridge or B section of every song starts on non-1

      I dare you to record a song that doesn't use the major one as the first chord of the A or B section.

     i almost never use the 1 chord to start the B sec

      I don't think you've done that since "what's going on". Just an idea..love your songs, just a friendly dare..a minor song with like a hip-hoppy beat would be amazing from you I think. But don't worry, I'm just a creatively stifled dude who is bitter because I don't have the guts or focus to put myself out there or work hard on my own music, so I critique other people's music to feel better about myself. Hope you have a great day and happy songwriting!!

11.15.18  12:40 pm   Been listening to a lot of joni mitchell lately, and I've been really inspired by her guitar parts... particularly how she uses so many alternate tunings to get some cool fresh chord voicings.. I know you're not really a guiarist, but my question is, do you think that there's any way to figure out what tuning is being used just by listening to a song?

     it's kind of like a murder mystery. you just gotta study the clues and you might figure it out, or you might not in which case the murderer will go free

      I was thinking that the tonic chord provides a big clue. You wouldnt tune to open D, but then play in the key of G# or something (if you're in open D, your 1chord will probably be D). But once you throw in capos to the mix the tonic chord clue isn't very helpful (you can tune to open D, but then put your capo on the 2nd fret to play in E, etc)... Also, side question, how does using a lot of different tunings work live? Like were 50% of joni mitchell concerts just her tuning her guitar a million times?

     multiple guitars. depending on your income bracket you may even have a person hand them to you and take away the previous one

11.15.18  12:30 pm   What do you think about when you write your notes?

     anything

11.15.18  12:22 pm   why does music make me think and feel things

     scientists are still trying to figure that out, but i almost think they never will. but someone else might

11.15.18  12:16 pm   my thoughts run rampart what to do

     let them out! let them run around. and meet people

11.15.18  12:13 pm   will you ever continue the music school series?

     i sincerely tried to, but i got 13 seconds in and realized that all i have to say is simply nothing and everything at the same time. i figured out i was better off just doing the music. although i still would like to take another shot at explaining it

11.15.18  12:12 pm   have you ever recorded a song, then, some time later, decided you didn't like the recording and redid it?

     almost never

11.15.18  12:11 pm   How long did it take you to realize doing exactly what you want to do is what's best for you? 

     i realize that frequently, and it takes anywhere from 1 nano second to 3 days. i don't know if i am supposed to measure realization time from the actual realization (which is always instantaneous) or if i am supposed to measure the entire time before i realized it, which means all the way back to the previous time i most recently forgot. which i unfortunately don't remember

11.15.18  11:45 am   hey bill, do you believe in birds?

     yes

11.15.18  10:27 am   why is slow down so good

     to please the shareholders

11.15.18  10:21 am   Do you ever get panic attacks? I'm trying to find ways to cope 

     you must launch a counter attack

11.15.18  10:08 am   What's the best thing you've ever seen while looking out of your car window?

     double rainbow

11.15.18  10:02 am   are your videos hard to do?

     yes but if they are hard they need to be easier so i can do more better things. and then when i do more better things it therefore gets harder. which means those things need to get easier to make room for newer better things. so therefore a steady equilibrium is maintained of blackout madness

      How long do you take making/editing them?

     the entire video/song needs to be done within a 2 week period because they must be released on each alternating tuesday

11.15.18  9:48 am   how did you make the purply bouncy clock bounce so well on "slow down"? and what software is that?

     holy crap i don't remember the purply bouncing clock. i made that video so insanely fast i am blissfully proud to announce i essentially don't remember it. i remember the bird but not any purple bouncing clock

11.15.18  9:45 am   how to read

     i don't know

11.15.18  9:43 am   11.14.18  2:51 pm no, i think you misunderstood, favourite things change for me many times in a lifetime as well. favourite things change for everyone i guess. but the thing that confuses me is: (You mentioned that) as soon as you pick a favourite thing (for example a song), a different one instantly becomes your new favourite. Thats kinda odd, does this really happen to you? For example, you say this to another person: "oh yeah this song is my favourite", and then instantly another song becomes your favourite.                   
Why do you think that's the case for you? please correct me and explain what you mean by those "picking favourites"-statements if i am wrong or i misunderstood you

     what would you assume is a normal amount of time for a song to be your 'favorite?' it is impossible for me to take seriously because i happen to know that every song ever made contains a full grown microcosm of our entire universe inside it. it just depends which ones we happen to see on a particular day. for every song i can currently hear, i know there are trillions more which are just as good. it's kind of like when you show a toy to a child. that's their favorite because that's the one you are currently showing to them

11.15.18  9:40 am   what inspired you to write the end of "we could just get high" (from 2:25 to 3:29)? 

     i don't remember but that sounds like the kind of thing that writes itself

11.15.18  9:28 am   What were you doing on this day twenty years ago?

     playing chess i assume

11.15.18  9:20 am   11.14.18  9:06 pm   what should i look for to help determine their thrill engagement strategy

     from what i can tell, i don't see why it would be worth your time (money). the reason i think this is because i happen to know that every molecule of this universe is virtually jam packed with songwriting lessons. free. at least that's how it is in the world in live in

11.15.18  7:55 am   do you still have a stockpile of old unrecorded songs

     yes

     or are you just going off songs you're writing this year

     the last 6 were brand new

11.15.18  7:04 am   Why do use the word "and" so much in your songs?

     it's a very useful and popular word which i like very much, but, i am pleased to announce that due to public outrage i will be never using it again

11.15.18  6:58 am   What motivates you?

     the entire world

      and will you ever stop inspiring us?

     i will never stop trying to

11.15.18  6:34 am   do you believe that entertainment such as books, tv series, movies, anime etc. need to be thematically deep, have some form of underlying meaning or have something to say about the world to be "good"?

     no but they surely have it anyway

11.15.18  6:33 am   When will you do another song with real life bill featured in it? (like in "when i get older")

     i don't know but soon

11.15.18  5:18 am   what are your favourite ways to change keys 

     in a way that feels like a scientific breakthrough and yet is still completely safe for non-scientists

11.15.18  4:33 am   how can i become someone i'm proud to be?

     start by finding some examples of people who you are proud of. just to get the ball rolling

11.15.18  4:22 am   Something you wish you were taught when you were younger?

     how old i was going to get

11.15.18  3:22 am   how can i tell when i'm in hell?

     you always are

11.15.18  3:16 am   Hi Bill! I have some tunes I am trying to put together into a song. How do you go about linking them? 

     i absolutely do not

11.15.18  3:09 am   how do u mske your graphics?

     i'm not sure anymore

      any software recommendations? 

     no. the trick to making good graphics is to practice with any tools you have. any new tools you get will not be any good for you until you spend a lot of time getting used to it and learning it. beyond that it doesn't make a difference what you use. for almost everything i've ever done it has been to my advantage to use simpler tools than i thought i needed. because it makes me think a bit more sideways

11.15.18  3:03 am   I hate myself. Any tips?

     try to avoid yourself
